purpose: To help users discover and explore career paths that align with their personal interests and skills using AI insights
principle: Leverages machine learning algorithms to analyze user input and suggest relevant career paths
reusability: Can be integrated into career guidance platforms or educational tools via its API
limitations: Limited to predefined career paths and requires accurate user input for effective suggestions
name: explorecareers
description: Explore careers based on your interests and skills with AI
highlight: Provides personalized career exploration based on user interests and skills utilizing AI
